
BE-ma {1}ma-ti-iʾ-DINGIR DUMU-MEŠ-šu₂ GAL-MEŠ-šu₂ ša₂ ina a-de-e ša₂ {1}aš-šur-ERIM.GABA MAN KUR-aš-šur i-ha-ṭu-u-ni {LU₂}ENGAR-šu₂ ina EDIN a.a il-sa-a a-la-la ur-qit EDIN lu la E₃-a {d}UTU lu la IGI {MI₂}ha-bi-ti A-ME a.a ih-ba-a A-MEŠ nag-bi x x x x lu ma-ka-al-šu-nu x x x x x lu maš-ti-su-nu x x x x x li-ir-x+x x+x x x x x x x+x x+x x x x x x x x x+x+x x x+x x x x x x x x x x x ma-a ina ta-mit ša₂ {1}aš-šur-ERIM.GABA MAN KUR-aš-šur ni-ih-ti-ṭi 

šum₂-mu {1}KI.MIN ina a-de-e an-nu-ti ša₂ {1}aš-šur-ERIM.GABA MAN KUR-aš-šur i-ha-ṭu-ni x x x x x la i-da-gal-u-ni x x x x x x x x x x u {URU}NINA KI.MIN x x x x x x x x x x UN-MEŠ KUR-šu₂ x x x x x x x x x la ta-ga-lu-ni šum₂-mu mu-a-tin-ni la mu-at-ka šum₂-mu ba-la-ṭin-ni la ba-laṭ-ka-ni ki-i ša₂ TI.LA ša₂ ZI-MEŠ-ka DUMU-MEŠ-ka GAL-MEŠ-ka ku-nu-ni TI.LA ša₂ {1}aš-šur-ERIM.GABA DUMU-MEŠ-šu₂ GAL-MEŠ-šu₂ la tu₂-ba-ʾu-u-ni aš-šur AD DINGIR-MEŠ na-din LUGAL-ti KUR-ka ana tu₂-ša₂-ri UN-MEŠ-ka ana GIR₃.BAL URU-MEŠ-ka ana DUL-ME E₂-ka ana har-ba-ti lu-tir
